mapper.sql: id as id, message as message, message_name as messageName, message_state as messageState, send_type as sendType, send_rate as sendRate, send_time as sendTime, start_time as startTime, end_time as endTime, is_delete as isDelete, audit_state as auditState, create_time as createTime, creator_id as creatorId, creator_name as creatorName, modify_time as modifyTime, modify_id as modifyId, modify_name as modifyName
mapper.insert: insert into drt_opr_inside_message (id, message, message_name, message_state, send_type, send_rate, send_time, start_time, end_time, is_delete, audit_state, create_time, creator_id, creator_name, modify_time, modify_id, modify_name) values (#{id}, #{message}, #{messageName}, #{messageState}, #{sendType}, #{sendRate}, #{sendTime}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{isDelete}, #{auditState}, #{createTime}, #{creatorId}, #{creatorName}, #{modifyTime}, #{modifyId}, #{modifyName})
